website_summaries.verdict: A costly yet luxurious boot for day to night. It's ideal for women with busy lives who don’t want to miss out on the latest trends.
pros: Chocolate brown exterior contrasts with the buttery smooth leather to make this the boot that can be worn many ways
Their versatility makes them worth the price
cons: Boots are not lined which can cause problems for some customers
High price, but classic so can be worn for years

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous getting these boots because I am a petite person with wide calves and since I didn't see any reviews through Amazon or the web on how these boots fit. I decided to take a chance as I already owned a few Nine west boots and order my normal size of 6 (would had purchased a half size if available). When I received the boots, the material is on the thick/minimal stretch side so it fit a little tight but I broke them in and they actually fit comfortably. The heel is just about right for me as shown and listed. Love the classy look and great to wear out for any occasion including work.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOTS!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these boots. Needed them for a funeral in October and walked around a lot in them. Fit is perfect and they're comfortable. Would recommend. I wear a 6M and the fit is great, even with socks on over my pantyhose inside the boots. (It was COLD up on that mountain)!!! Yep, I really like them and will get a lot of use out of them-hopefully for happier reasons.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyedlady

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best boots decision I've made. I'm usually a 5.5 size but when I bought these, the 5.5 cost >200$ but the size 5 was $35! I decided to order the size 5 anyway hoping I could fit. It's a little snug with thick socks but I could definitely wear it! They're comfortable considering the heels and look very classy. The only problem that I have is that the zipper thing is gold. I'd rather it had been brown or black, because the gold sort of stands out a little. But that's just a tiny thing. Overall I'm extremely happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: reshmis93

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather Boots
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather boots. The heels are sturdy but sleek. the only problem with this boot it's not wide enough for a person like myself who have a size 16 calves. I would love for it to have room on top, but the zipper never went up. the boot got narrow as it reaches the top.
customer_reviews.author: sweetorange

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: I love everything on it except the zipper on the side it’s rubbing each other when you start walking...
customer_reviews.author: BabyLove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS. Nine West does it again. Very comfortable and absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Pegb

customer_reviews.title: These boots are elegant and fit perfect, they are leather and come with great inside ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are elegant and fit perfect, they are leather and come with great inside forms to keep them nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dianne Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable despite the heel size. You will need to wear socks with them to keep your feet warm as they are unlined. But I wore them to work a lot this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wide calf
customer_reviews.text: The boot comes in wide calf sizes not regular FYI
customer_reviews.author: Sian Elliott

customer_reviews.title: great quality and good fit
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair, great quality and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: IL Horn Fan

product_meta.title: NINE WEST Women's Sabora Winter Boot
product_meta.description:
Nine west offers a quick edit of the runways -- pinpointing the must have looks of the season, and translating what is fun, hip, and of the moment. it is trend-right footwear that you will reach for in your closet again and again. nine west is sure to be your trusted resource for everyday chic style.

It is trend-right footwear that you will reach for in your closet again and again. Nine West is sure to be your trusted resource for everyday chic style.
